review.author: Dowoon Seo
review.content: A Japanese restaurant that I went to with my Japanese friend's invitation. From entering the store, we offer an adventure to the ninja world. This is fun. It's worth a visit. The food served on the course is creative and tastes good.

review.author: Heejun Lee
review.content: コンセプトレストラン。徹底している。駐車場も2時間無料スタッフが全力で盛り上げてくれる◎食事が洋なのが面白い。

review.author: Todor Panev
review.content: Amazing place! Worth the money. It’s a show, and the food was really god and high quality.

review.content: Healthy taste! I'm sure we've tried many different dishes if we go together. I was sad that only two of us ate together. You can make a reservation by phone!

review.author: Han-ho Yoon
review.content: It is a pork cutlet restaurant with a long history in Tokyo. It is popular among Japanese as well as tourists and Koreans, and it boasts a long waiting time.

review.author: Joo-yun Lee
review.content: My Sen was introduced in the travel brochure and the review was good. I was going to have a cheap and delicious lunch for lunch, but I couldn't order the lunch menu because it was a red day (public holiday), so I ate it as a 2,000 yen roscatz, which was delicious as a popular restaurant.
